job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Position: Mid to senior level software engineer

 

Who We Are

MLJ Environmental is a small consulting firm located in Davis, California that develops customized software solutions for its clients. We have over 25 years of experience protecting the prosperity of communities and their natural resources. We simplify regulatory compliance with innovative approaches to science and data. MLJ Environmental is seeking a mid to senior level software developer to join our team. Our staff are bright, innovative individuals who are interested in taking on new challenges within their careers. The successful candidate should be comfortable in all aspects of software development.  This person should be comfortable working both independently and in a small group. We are seeking an individual willing to learn, be flexible and creative. We are a dog friendly office.

 

Schedule and Salary

This is an exempt, full time position with 40 hours a week. The salary will be based on experience and competitive within the industry and local market. Full time employment benefits include health, vision, dental and life insurance. Other benefits include vacation, paid holidays, sick leave, and a 401K plan.

 

Example of Duties

Essential functions may include but are not limited to the following:

  • Develop Microsoft ASP.NET MVC web applications using C#
  • Use Visual studio for application development.
  • Determine solutions to technical hurdles that may arise during the design, testing and maintenance process.
  • Collaborate with testing team, design team, and implementation team using various diagrams, flow charts and models to assist with internal communication.
  • Identify and address performance concerns including fixing bugs and/or addressing client concerns.
  • Ensure that projects meet client deadlines.
  • Document aspects of the system/project for future upgrades and maintenance.
  • Other duties as assigned.

 

Qualifications

  • Completed a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/CIS/MIS or a related field.
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience within software development.

Skills

  • Well versed in HTML5, CSS, SASS, Javascript, JSON and Jquery.
  • Some knowledge of relational databases (SQL, MySQL, MSSQL).
  • Exposure to cloud technologies (Amazon Web Services/AWS).
  • Attention to detail and organization to be able towork on various parts of a system or application while being accurate and thorough.
  • The ability to adapt and work on multiple different projects in the same day.
  • The ability to work in a collaborative environment and communicate. Examples include team white board sessions, storyboarding design concepts, and fleshing out pros and cons of various design options.

To apply please send a 1) cover letter, 2) resume, and 3) contact information for three references, to Trisha Turner at tturner@mljenvironmental.com. Please include in the subject line: Software Engineer Application and reference in the email where you heard about this position in the email. Applications missing any of the above may not be considered for this position.   No phone calls please. Additional information regarding MLJ can be found on our website at www.mljenvironmental.com.
